quotes.quote: Though the vicious can sometimes pour affliction upon the good, their power is transient and their punishment certain; and that innocence, though oppressed by injustice, shall, supported by patience, finally triumph over misfortune!
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: What are riches - grandeur - health itself, to the luxury of a pure conscience, the health of the soul; - and what the sufferings of poverty, disappointment, despair - to the anguish of an afflicted one!
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Our character...is an omen of our destiny, and the more integrity we have and keep, the simpler and nobler that destiny is likely to be.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: In silence man can most readily preserve his integrity.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody's going to know whether you did it or not.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Integrity combined with faithfulness is a powerful force and worthy of great respect.
quotes.author: Real Live Preacher

quotes.quote: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I ran the wrong kind of business, but I did it with integrity.
quotes.author: Sydney Biddle Barrows
